name: brittany
description: Runs the Haskell code formatting tool Brittany

brittany.path.description: Path to the brittany executable. This will be wrapped in double quotes to escape it, so your path can e.g. include spaces.

brittany.enable.description: Whether the extension should be enabled.

brittany.stackEnable.description: Whether the extension should use brittany through stack (stack exec brittany) instead of brittany on the PATH.

brittany.additionalFlags.description: Additional flags to pass to brittany, e.g. --indent AMOUNT. These are unescaped. They should not attempt to change the input or output files.
